item.description: Abbey and Brittany Hensel's latest TikTok video has got everybody talking.

item.description: Craig has made his predictions for this year.

item.title: Here’s what the ‘new Nostradamus’ accurately predicted would happen in 2024
item.description: Craig can predict when events happen before they have occurred.

item.title: Wild boar wreaks havoc after sneaking into supermarket
item.description: Customers at Super Point Hypermarket in Kerala, India, were doing their normal shopping when a surprise visitor entered the premises.

item.title: The human brain processes thoughts 5,000,000 times slower than the average internet connection
item.description: The brain processes signals at about 10 bits per second, millions of times slower than an average Wi-Fi connection.
